name: Andreas Sahle
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I will name my first doughter 'Javascript', however to not completely ruin her life before it even began, I might obfuscate that and go with 'Jess' or just call her 'Elm' or 'Reason' to show her love and let her know that she is a wonderful snowflake.
what_can_i_contribute: I will talk and I will listen. And if that fails, I can always shut up and help carry the heavy stuff from front to back. ðŸ’ª
